price: Ɛbεma deε εwͻ wͻn yԑm ne wͻn honam mu no anane.
arabic: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
